        <META NAME="Description"                CONTENT="Towson University, a top public university located near Baltimore, Maryland, offers nationally recognized academic programs that prepare 
students with the leadership and professional skills necessary for today's world.
">
        <META NAME="Identifier-URL"             CONTENT="http://www.towson.edu/">

  m=s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0];a.async=1;a.src=g;m.parentNode.insertBefore(a,m)
  })(window,document,'script','//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js','ga');

#sc-smartboard-container
{ 
	width:100%;
	background-color: #cc0000;
	padding-top: 1px;
	padding-bottom: 1px;
	padding-right: 0px;
	padding-left: 0px; 
	text-align:center;
}

#sc-smartboard-container .sc-smartboard-item 
{
	margin: 0 auto; 
	width:978px;
	font-size: 12px;
	font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
	color: #ffffff;
	line-height: 18px;
	text-align:left;
}

#sc-smartboard-container .sc-smartboard-subject 
{
    margin: 2px 10px 0px 10px;
	font-size: 14px;
	font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
	color: #ffffff;
	font-weight: bold;
	line-height: 18px;
	LETTER-SPACING: 0.5px;
}

#sc-smartboard-container .sc-smartboard-item:last-child 
{
	border-bottom-width: 0;
}

#sc-smartboard-container .sc-smartboard-datetime 
{
	margin: 0px 10px 0px 10px;
	font-size: 12px;
	font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;
	color: #ffffff;
	float: right;
}

#sc-smartboard-container .sc-smartboard-message 
{
	clear: both;
	margin: 2px 10px 2px 10px;
	padding-top: 2px;
	padding-bottom: 5px; 
	border-top: 0px; 
}

#sc-smartboard-container .sc-smartboard-message a 
{
	clear: both;
	color: #ffffff; 
	text-decoration: underline;
	margin: 2px 10px 2px 0px;
	padding-top: 2px;
	padding-bottom: 5px; 
	border-top: 0px; 
}

<script type="text/javascript">
  $(function() {
    var galleries = $('.wkphoto-gallery').adGallery();
    
    
    $(document).ready(function(){
        galleries[0].settings.description_wrapper = $('#descriptions');
        
      }
    );
  });
</script>

        	<h2 class="thehead">Top Stories</h2>
            
            <!--- Use this format for the stories below -- no more than 5 stories:

<p class="linebelow"><a href="http://tunews.towson.edu/2014/07/15/towson-alumna-breaks-another-record-on-american-ninja-warrior/"><strong>Towson alumna breaks another record</strong> on “American Ninja Warrior”</a></p>

For the last story on the list, use this format (the difference is the <p> tag without class="linebelow":

<p><a href="http://tunews.towson.edu/2014/07/09/honors-college-partners-with-seelio-to-showcase-student-success/">Honors College partners with Seelio to <strong>showcase student success</strong></a></p>

--->
<p class="linebelow"><a href="http://tunews.towson.edu/2015/09/30/tupd-recognized-nationally-for-efforts-to-improve-campus-safety/"><strong>TUPD recognized nationally</strong> for efforts to improve campus safety</a></p>
<p class="linebelow">
<a href="http://tunews.towson.edu/2015/11/13/towson-is-now-officially-bicycle-friendly/"><strong>Towson i</strong>s now officially <strong>bicycle friendly!</strong></a></p>
<p class="linebelow"><a href="http://tunews.towson.edu/2015/10/28/new-tu-student-group-promotes-girl-talk-on-campus/">TU’s Red Tent Foundation <strong>gives women a safe place to talk</strong></a></p>
<p class="linebelow"><a href="http://tunews.towson.edu/2015/10/26/towson-universitys-grub-street-shines-in-national-competition/"><strong>“Grub Street” shines</strong> again in national competition</a></p>
<p><a href="http://tunews.towson.edu/2015/10/30/nicole-sherrod-shares-whats-next-for-wall-street/">Nicole Sherrod shares <strong>what’s next for Wall Street</strong></a></p>
<p style="margin-bottom: 0;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0;">&nbsp;</p>

	                    </div>
	                    </div>
                        
                        <div class="ca-item ca-item-5">
						<div class="ca-item-main">
						<a href="http://events.towson.edu/event/exhibition_cross-pollinated_hybrid_art_abuzz#.Viqe-X6rSUk">	<img src="/main/homeparts/images/promoters/xpollinated-hp.jpg" width=154 height=134 border=0 alt="Cross-Pollinated"></a>
							<a href="http://events.towson.edu/event/exhibition_cross-pollinated_hybrid_art_abuzz#.Viqe-X6rSUk">
						  <h3>Cross-Pollinated</h3></a>
							<h4>Come see the exhibition <i>Cross-Pollinated: Hybrid Art Abuzz</i>.</h4>
						</div>
						</div>  
                        
                   <div class="ca-item ca-item-6">
						<div class="ca-item-main">
						<a href="http://events.towson.edu/event/no_child_by_nilajah_sun#.VlOFMXarRph">	<img src="/main/homeparts/images/promoters/nochild-hppromo.jpg" width=154 height=134 border=0 alt="No Child"></a>
							<a href="http://events.towson.edu/event/no_child_by_nilajah_sun#.VlOFMXarRph">
						  <h3>No Child</h3></a>
							<h4>See a student production of Nilaja Sun's "No Child."</h4>		
						</div>
						</div>
                        
                                               
                    <div class="ca-item ca-item-7">
						<div class="ca-item-main">
						<a href="http://www.towson.edu/president/presidentialsearch/index.asp">	<img src="/main/homeparts/images/promoters/PrezSearch_promo1.jpg" width=154 height=134 border=0 alt="Presidential Search"></a>
							<a href="http://www.towson.edu/president/presidentialsearch/index.asp">
						  <h3>Presidential Search</h3></a>
							<h4>The search for Towson University’s 14th president.</h4>		
						</div>
						</div>                        
                        
                        
                                                     
       
                                               
                 		
</div>
                    
                
					
						
					</div>
					
				</div>
			</div>
			
	
		
        
        
        </div>	
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
var _qevents = _qevents || [];
 
(function() {
var elem = document.createElement('script');
elem.src = (document.location.protocol == "https:" ? "https://secure" : "http://edge") + ".quantserve.com/quant.js";
elem.async = true;
elem.type = "text/javascript";
var scpt = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
scpt.parentNode.insertBefore(elem, scpt);
})();
 
_qevents.push(
{qacct:"p-18SyZUJaqXU8g",labels:"_fp.event.Towson Homepage"}
);
</script>
